languages.text: "Ясно же все мне стало над телом брата Игнильфа, когда ты назвал{mf||а} меня последним из стаи. Тогда-то и ясна стала дорога, что зовет меня".
"Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."
languages.original_text: "Ясно же все мне стало над телом брата Игнильфа, когда ты назвал{mf||а} меня последним из стаи. Тогда-то и ясна стала дорога, что зовет меня".

traits.locale_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."
"Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."
"Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."
"Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

languages.text: «Todo me quedó claro cuando estaba junto al cadáver de mi hermano Ignilf y usted me llamó el último de mi jauría. Entonces me quedó claro qué camino me esperaba».
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

traits.locale_text: «Todo me quedó claro cuando estaba junto al cadáver de mi hermano Ignilf y usted me llamó el último de mi jauría. Entonces me quedó claro qué camino me esperaba».

languages.text: “当我站在我的兄弟伊格尼夫的尸体前，你说我是狼群中的最后一员，当时一切都变得清晰了。那个时候，我才意识到我应当踏上怎样的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

traits.locale_text: “当我站在我的兄弟伊格尼夫的尸体前，你说我是狼群中的最后一员，当时一切都变得清晰了。那个时候，我才意识到我应当踏上怎样的道路。”

languages.text: 「イグニルフの遺体のそばに立ったとき、すべてがハッキリと分かった。そして、あんたは俺が群れの最後の生き残りだと言った。その時、俺は自分に呼びかけている道に気づいたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

traits.locale_text: 「イグニルフの遺体のそばに立ったとき、すべてがハッキリと分かった。そして、あんたは俺が群れの最後の生き残りだと言った。その時、俺は自分に呼びかけている道に気づいたんだ」

languages.text: « J'ai fini par ouvrir les yeux quand j'ai vu le cadavre de mon frère Ignilf à mes pieds et que vous vous êtes {mf|adressé|adressée} à moi en tant que dernier survivant de ma meute. C'est là que j'ai compris la voie que j'étais appelé à suivre. »
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai fini par ouvrir les yeux quand j'ai vu le cadavre de mon frère Ignilf à mes pieds et que vous vous êtes {mf|adressé|adressée} à moi en tant que dernier survivant de ma meute. C'est là que j'ai compris la voie que j'étais appelé à suivre. »

languages.text: "Alles wurde mir klar, als ich über dem Leichnam meines Bruders Ignilf stand und Ihr mich den Letzten meines Rudels nanntet. Da wurde mir klar, welche Straße nach mir rief."
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

traits.locale_text: "Alles wurde mir klar, als ich über dem Leichnam meines Bruders Ignilf stand und Ihr mich den Letzten meines Rudels nanntet. Da wurde mir klar, welche Straße nach mir rief."

languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

languages.text: "Kardeşim İgnilf'in önünde dikilirken sen bana sürünün son kurdu dediğinde her şeyi anladım. İşte o zaman yolların beni çağırdığını fark ettim."
languages.original_text: "Everything became clear to me when I stood over my brother Ignilf's body, and you called me the last of the pack. That was when I realised what road was calling to me."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşim Ignilf'in önünde dikildiğimde ve sen bana sürünün son kurdu dediğinde her şeyi anladım. İşte o zaman yolların beni çağırdığını fark ettim."
